title: Galaxy S22 series canâ€™t use eSIM on Google Fi, at least not yet
content:
Samsung has offered eSIM support on its phones for years, but the US models were always left out of the fun. That finally changed with the Galaxy S22 series, which can connect to US cell networks without the need for a physical SIM card. However, it seems at least one carrier with eSIM support is

The post Galaxy S22 series can’t use eSIM on Google Fi, at least not yet appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google Fi still requires a phyiscal SIM card on the Galaxy S22 series, even though the carrier supports eSIM on iPhones and Pixel devices.
